sentences.sentence: The lateness of the hour was almost the biggest thing of all.
sentences.translation: 时间的延迟几乎是所有事情中最重要的事情。

sentences.sentence: Although all the students greeted the　professor as they arrived, few apologized for their lateness.
sentences.translation: 尽管所有学生到场时都问候了教授，却没有几个人为他们的迟到道歉。
